meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>treatment</kanji> of your <kanji>boundary</kanji> of your neighborhood is something you should be concerned about, because it's your <vocabulary>environment</vocabulary> and if you don't take care of it, who will?
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
